I design things 
























Human
I enjoy cultural idioms, language, and the differences between eastern and western thought.
Craft
As a Product Designer and Creative Technologist, I’m dedicated to making software, and the web, more accessible and human-centered by facilitating the transfer of information. I design using proven methodologies, research, and intuition. I communicate and collaborate with global teams, especially through visual prototypes and iterative processes to provide clarity.
